detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PickleFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PickleFinance.sol#60-78) has payable functions:
	 - PickleFinance.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PickleFinance.sol#73-75)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	 - [PickleFinance.receive()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PickleFinance.sol#L73-L75)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
